
Two careless friends reused a prime while generating their RSA keys. Intercept their encrypted messages: 407428183790334810918136940766595595248553983448999395311008218518785627952077677142827076495875417276300220865807165605266122131388827543045169598090162097000212994552714601522363375184105751941257718471534556988772466209345436190


The flag format is flag{...}
n=715717397159834733044689297354651964877445710196275568163593089307573378893422437855635709663572222668259408483729072373854536130777809375183166125856182758405141077783103021144653616159823878724629757274345581935520855580836057119, n2=664080213702709925241248224913207444581517433992679454634093997884397804724854515232115813379352217706524572368004104874162828714179166140098494200396771980359663765952928487374206903031733428416186591637705685721401883924598434559, e=484368585107653876112424118577470543788670952786583854190030659394233254565409865258982507450622649511403377646269174093659937703832065289349301291274836636538000799377170511426713504318898720164070646702809610925942343852563279233

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{lqdk9k88}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 407428183790334810918136940766595595248553983448999395311008218518785627952077677142827076495875417276300220865807165605266122131388827543045169598090162097000212994552714601522363375184105751941257718471534556988772466209345436190
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=715717397159834733044689297354651964877445710196275568163593089307573378893422437855635709663572222668259408483729072373854536130777809375183166125856182758405141077783103021144653616159823878724629757274345581935520855580836057119, n2=664080213702709925241248224913207444581517433992679454634093997884397804724854515232115813379352217706524572368004104874162828714179166140098494200396771980359663765952928487374206903031733428416186591637705685721401883924598434559, e=484368585107653876112424118577470543788670952786583854190030659394233254565409865258982507450622649511403377646269174093659937703832065289349301291274836636538000799377170511426713504318898720164070646702809610925942343852563279233
